text: Edwin Thomas "Ed" Shaughnessy (January 9, 1929 – May 24, 2013) was an American singer of swing music, and bebop drummer who was associated with The Tonight Show Band that appeared on The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson. He was born in Jersey City, New Jersey and grew up in New York City. Shaughnessy was married to Ilene Woods. He died on May 24, 2013, aged 84.Ed Shaughnessy dies at 84; renowned jazz drummerEd Shaughnessy, Longtime ‘Tonight Show’ Drummer, Dead at 84 ==References== Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Singers from New York City Category:1929 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Musicians from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:Singers from Jersey City, New Jersey Category:Musicians from New York City Category:American drummers
title: Ed Shaughnessy
